text: Bishop Mile Bogović (7 August 1939 – 19 December 2020) was a Croatian Roman Catholic prelate. He was born in Gornji Cerovac, Kingdom of Yugoslavia. Bogović was a Titular Bishop of Tamata and Auxiliary Bishop of Archdiocese of Rijeka–Senj from 4 June 1999 until 25 May 2000 and the first Diocesan Bishop of the new created Gospić-Senj from 25 May 2000 until his retirement on 4 April 2016. Bogović died on 19 December 2020 of COVID-19 in Rijeka, Croatia at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Croatia Category:Croatian people Category:Roman Catholic bishops
title: Mile Bogović
